attributes.additional_details: Your just are not looking after the English people first. The country is in unrest the way we are being treated. Stop the boats and deport all illegals. Save our women and children from being harassed by these illegals that dont know our laws and just please themselves and are free to roam the streets doing whatever they please. Our country isn't our own anymore.
attributes.background: Get starmer out of office and put someone in charge that knows what they are doing. We need reform in charge to make England great again.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Call an immediate general election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
